auth.doNotHaveAccountYet: Do not have an account yet?
auth.signUpToAcceptInvite: Please sign in/up to accept the invite
auth.clickToAcceptAs: Click the button below to accept the invite with as {email}
auth.acceptInviteWithDifferentAccount: Want to accept the invite with a different account?
auth.alreadyHaveAccountStatement: I already have an account, I want to sign in instead
auth.doNotHaveAccountStatement: I do not have an account, I want to sign up instead
auth.addingToOrganization: We are adding you to {name}. Please Wait...
auth.passwordResetSubheading: Enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetSuccessMessage: Check your Inbox! We emailed you a link for resetting your Password.
auth.passwordLengthError: Please provide a password with at least 6 characters
auth.sendLinkSuccess: We sent you a link to your email! Follow the link to sign in.
auth.verificationCodeHint: Enter the code we sent you by SMS
auth.sendMfaCodeError: Sorry, we couldn't send you a verification code
auth.verifyMfaCodeError: Ops! It looks like the code is not correct
auth.reauthenticateDescription: For security reasons, we need you to re-authenticate
auth.errorAlertHeading: Sorry, we could not authenticate you
auth.emailConfirmationAlertHeading: We sent you a confirmation email.
auth.emailConfirmationAlertBody: Welcome! Please check your email and click the link to verify your account.

errors.User already registered: This credential is already in use. Please try with another one.
errors.Email not confirmed: Please confirm your email address before signing in
errors.default: We have encountered an error. Please ensure you have a working internet connection and try again
errors.generic: Sorry, we weren't able to authenticate you. Please try again.
errors.link: Sorry, we encountered an error while sending your link. Please try again.

common.modalConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to continue?
common.imageInputLabel: Click here to upload an image
common.genericServerErrorHeading: Sorry, something went wrong while processing your request. Please contact us if the issue persists.
common.pageNotFoundSubHeading: Apologies, the page you were looking for was not found.
common.genericErrorSubHeading: Apologies, an error occurred while processing your request. Please contact us if the issue persists.

owner.label: Owner
owner.description: Can change any setting, invite new members, and manage billing.

admin.label: Admin
admin.description: Can change some settings, invite members, and perform disruptive actions.

member.label: Member
member.description: Cannot invite members or change settings.
